ui.label: Editor Mode

ui.label: Editor Standalone Window
ui.desc: Create a plugin that will add a button in the Window Menu that summons an empty standalone tab window when clicked.

ui.label: Editor Toolbar Button
ui.desc: Create a plugin that will add a button to the toolbar in the Level Editor. Start by implementing something in the created 'OnButtonClick' event.

ui.label: Third Party Library

ui.label: Empty
ui.desc: An empty C++ class with a default contructor and destructor.

ui.label: Character
ui.desc: A Character is a type of Pawn that includes the ability to walk around.

ui.label: Pawn
ui.desc: A Pawn is an actor than can be 'possessed' and receive input from a controller.

ui.label: Actor
ui.desc: An Actor is an object that can be placed or spawned in the world.

ui.label: Actor Component
ui.desc: An ActorComponent is a reusable component that can be added to any actor.

ui.label: Scene Component
ui.desc: A SceneComponent is a component that has a scene transform and can be attached to other scene components.

ui.label: Player Camera Manager
ui.desc: A PlayerCameraManager is responsible for managing the camera for a particular player.

ui.label: Player Controller
ui.desc: A PlayerController is an actor responsible for controlling a Pawn used by the player.

ui.label: Game Mode Base
ui.desc: A GameModeBase defines the game being played, its rules, scoring and other facets of the game type.

ui.label: World Settings
ui.desc: A WorldSettings is an Actor containing all script accessible world properties.

ui.label: HUD
ui.desc: Base class of the heads-up display.

ui.label: Player State
ui.desc: A PlayerState is created for every player on a server (or in a standalone game).

ui.label: Game State Base
ui.desc: A GameStateBase is a class that manages the game's global state and is spawned by GameModeBase.

ui.label: Blueprint Function Library
ui.desc: This class is a base class for any function libraries exposed to blueprints.

ui.label: Slate Widget
ui.desc: A custom Slate widget, deriving from SCompoundWidget.

ui.label: Slate Widget Style
ui.desc: A custom Slate widget style, deriving from FSlateWidgetStyle, along with its associated UObject wrapper class.

ui.label: Unreal Interface
ui.desc: A UObject Interface class, to be implemented by other UObject-based classes.
